short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open MotionBox from the current tab's url.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension opens the MotionBox video browser from the current tab's url.

MotionBox is a video browser designed to stream Internet videos from text queries. It's a multi-service video searching and streaming application that supports a variety of video backends.

This application is designed by a developer of VLC Media Player.
